thread.title: CDC to Scale Back Work in Dozens of Foreign Countries Amid Funding Worries

author: Betsy McKay
title: CDC to Scale Back Work in Dozens of Foreign Countries Amid Funding Worries

organizations.name: centers for disease control and prevention

text:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention plans to scale back or discontinue its work to prevent infectious-disease epidemics and other health threats in 39 foreign countries because it expects funding for the work to end, the agency told employees.

The CDC currently works in 49 countries as part of an initiative called the global health security agenda, to prevent, detect and respond to dangerous infectious disease threats. It helps expand surveillance for new viruses and​ ​drug-resistant bacteria, modernize laboratories...
